Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.cache

Interface Summary
Cache Defines the API to access cached items
CacheCallback Callback used to retrieve objects on cache miss
CacheListener Listener for cache events
CacheManager Handles the retrieval of Cache instances
 

Class Summary
BaseCacheManager Base implementation for CacheManager
CacheAdapter Used to subclass CacheListener without needing to implement all methods
CacheListenerAdapter Base class for cache listener adapters from other cache technologies
EhCacheCache A Cache implementation which uses EHCache as backend
EhCacheCacheManager A cache manager which uses EhCache
NullValue Some caches don't support adding null values.
